message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,000,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $750,000 is a bit too low, I'm willing to negotiate.  How about we meet in the middle at $900,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
